comment_form.parosmia_reaction_field_label: How did you react after smelling this scent?

training_session_entry.rating_title: How intense is the smell of this substance?

timer_encouragements.0: Try to remember exactly how this substance should smell
timer_encouragements.1: Imagine yourself holding the real thing in your hands...the look, colours, texture and smell.
timer_encouragements.2: Can you recall your last vivid memory of this smell?
timer_encouragements.3: What positive associations can you make with this smell?
